abstract: A look at one especially challenging figure for President Obama in the latest poll. Also, Mitt Romney has the most endorsements, but will they help?
snippet: A look at one especially challenging figure for President Obama in the latest poll. Also, Mitt Romney has the most endorsements, but will they help?
lead_paragraph: A look at one especially challenging number for President Obama in the latest New York Times/CBS News poll. Also, Mitt Romney is the endorsement frontrunner, but how much will it help him?

headline.main: Caucus Video: A Tough Number for Obama
